page.title: 14 Events
page.content: The Darby and Joan Club hold Bingo sessions and Whist Drives. The School Sports Day and annual Fete are popular events. Church events include a Pancake Race along the Main Road, a Fete, a Harvest Supper, a Brass Band Concert, a Carol and Christingle service. There is a Church Choir and a group of Bell Ringers. This year the Reverend Ronald Amis organised a Palm Sunday Parade through the village, and held a Christian Mission. An exciting event held each year is the Raft Race from Westborough to Long Bennington Mill,run by the Young Farmers Club. All clubs organise money raising events such as coffee evenings, discos barbeques and auctions.
